registry_test.comment: Check that 'Configure minimum PIN length for startup' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'Require additional authentication at startup' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'ConfigureNonTPMStartupKeyUsage_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'ConfigureTPMUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.ConfigureTPMUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'ConfigurePINUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.ConfigurePINUsageDropDown_Require)'
Check that 'ConfigureTPMStartupKeyUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.ConfigureTPMStartupKeyUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'ConfigureTPMPINKeyUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.ConfigureTPMPINKeyUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'Allow enhanced PINs for startup' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'Choose how BitLocker-protected operating system drives can be recovered' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'OSAllowDRA_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'OSRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.OSRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Require)'
Check that 'OSRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.OSRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'OSHideRecoveryPage_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'OSActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'OSActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.OSActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_1)'
Check that 'OSRequireActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'Configure use of passwords for fixed data drives' is configured to 'Disabled'
Check that 'Allow access to BitLocker-protected fixed data drives from earlier versions of Windows' is configured to 'Disabled'
Check that 'Configure use of smart cards on fixed data drives' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'Choose how BitLocker-protected fixed drives can be recovered' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'FDVAllowDRA_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'FDVRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.FDVRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'FDVRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.FDVRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'FDVHideRecoveryPage_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'FDVActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'FDVActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.FDVActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_1)'
Check that 'FDVRequireActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'Configure use of smart cards on removable data drives' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'Allow access to BitLocker-protected removable data drives from earlier versions of Windows' is configured to 'Disabled'
Check that 'Choose how BitLocker-protected removable drives can be recovered' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'RDVAllowDRA_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'RDVRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.RDVRecoveryPasswordUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'RDVRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.RDVRecoveryKeyUsageDropDown_Disallow)'
Check that 'RDVHideRecoveryPage_Name' is configured to 'True'
Check that 'RDVActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'RDVActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_Name' is configured to '$(string.RDVActiveDirectoryBackupDropDown_1)'
Check that 'RDVRequireActiveDirectoryBackup_Name' is configured to 'False'
Check that 'Deny write access to removable drives not protected by BitLocker' is configured to 'Enabled'
Check that 'Configure use of passwords for removable data drives' is configured to 'Disabled'
